item.title: Snow sleigh game on Hololens2
item.description: Introducing our AR game circuit developed using Unity3D and MRTK3 for HoloLens 2. This project was brought to life through a collaborative effort between myself and Pauline Spinga. Here are the key steps of the project: Design In designing the circuit within a ski station environment, we sourced various models from free3D, turbosquid, and sketchfab websites. Additionally, we crafted a custom panel featuring our school logo. All elements were assembled in Blender, with additional snow textures for ambiance.
